pkgmetadata.longdescription: Frama-C is a suite of tools dedicated to the analysis of the source code of software written in C. It gathers several static analysis techniques in a single collaborative framework. The collaborative approach of Frama-C allows static analyzers to build upon the results already computed by other analyzers in the framework. Thanks to this approach, Frama-C provides sophisticated tools, such as a slicer and dependency analysis.
